answers.author: Jill Silverboard
answers.text:
Clearwater, FL held a grand opening for our CNG fueling station in October 2011.  While the program was typical for a ribbon cutting, we specifically invited local car dealerships who soon thereafter ordered several CNG vehicles for their showrooms.  Following the formalities we had give-aways and demonstrations.  Good Luck!

author: Mark Abeles-Allison
text: We are a week away from a grand opening of a new CNG fueling station.  Any suggestions on good program formats that make the most of an event?
title: Grand Openings
